reviews.review: Really good shooter, but its one thing what i have to say. In this game we have the worst anti-cheat system in shooters.
its a good game, just buy prime.
bon jeux juste chinois et les russes qui rendent fouu

The game is still great, even after 15+ years. There have been quite a few changes over the years but Valve hasn't really been able to weed out the cheaters. Some are really blatant and other more subtle but still cheaters. If they could find a way (?) to hard fix this then I think it'll be much better all around.

This game is good even in 2022 after the years.
But i feel like the matchmaking is really hard to play, i'm having way more fun on community servers instead of matchmaking.
